name: Cat Herders
description:
Herd the cats into the highlighted circle. 

Controls:

  • Use WASD to move
  • Press Spacebar to pick up / drop cats

Music and Art is licensed under https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/us/ and https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/.
